::: {.callout-tip title="Part 1. Thinking about life" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
[Part 1](vyudenko.blog/posts/time-tracking-1) of 5 of time tracking series. It serves as an introduction to the project and it's rationale. Other parts will go in depth and answer specific questions.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 2. Why track your daily life?" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
[Part 2](vyudenko.blog/posts/time-tracking-2) explains timetracking and goes over some of the reasons why you should or shouldn't track your daily activities. Who will benefit from using it and who won't.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 3. How to track your daily life?" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
[Part 3](vyudenko.blog/posts/time-tracking-3) lays out the approach and its set up. From choosing the categories to the actual tracking.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 4. Answering questions with data" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
[Part 4](vyudenko.blog/posts/time-tracking-4) provides examples of what kind of data-driven answers you can get by tracking your time.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 5. Other" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
In this part we look at other projects....
:::

Sources: https://flowingdata.com/2022/09/01/looking-for-meaning-in-the-everyday/ https://flowingdata.com/2021/11/23/most-common-daily-schedules-for-different-groups/ https://flowingdata.com/2017/10/19/american-daily-routine/ https://flowingdata.com/2023/07/25/when-is-dinner-by-state/ https://flowingdata.com/2011/03/20/daily-schedule-of-benjamin-franklin/ https://flowingdata.com/2019/07/16/how-the-american-work-day-changed-in-15-years/ https://lifehacker.com/how-to-track-everything-in-your-life-without-going-craz-1466537828 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lifelog#cite_note-1 https://www.nytimes.com/2007/10/29/us/29shields.html https://flowingdata.com/2014/09/04/when-people-work-by-job-category/ https://flowingdata.com/2019/04/02/data-comic-shows-an-average-american-day/ https://flowingdata.com/2021/08/19/daily-routine-2020/ https://flowingdata.com/2015/11/30/most-common-use-of-time-by-age-and-sex/
